instructions: In Notes on iCloud.com, select a note. If you do not see the notes list, see Show the folder or notes list in Notes on iCloud.com . Tap a blank line, then do one of the following: Add a bulleted list: type an asterisk followed by a space. Add a dashed list: type a hyphen followed by a space. Add a numbered list: type the number 1 and a full stop followed by a space. You can also tap the Choose Style button , then choose Bulleted List, Dashed List or Numbered List.

In Notes on iCloud.com, select a note. If you do not see the notes list, see Show the folder or notes list in Notes on iCloud.com . Select the lines you want to turn into a list, tap the Choose Style button in the toolbar, then choose Bulleted List, Dashed List or Numbered List.

In Notes on iCloud.com, select a note. If you do not see the notes list, see Show the folder or notes list in Notes on iCloud.com . Do either of the following: Add a checklist: tap a blank line, then tap the Make Checklist button in the toolbar. Turn existing lines into a checklist: select the lines, then tap the Make Checklist button in the toolbar.

In Notes on iCloud.com, select a note that contains a list. If you do not see the notes list, see Show the folder or notes list in Notes on iCloud.com . Do either of the following: Add a list item: tap anywhere in a list item, then tap Return. End a list and add a regular paragraph: tap at the end of the last list item, then tap Return twice.
